department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: sleeveless pullover shirt; cream ground fabric; hem flares outward at bottom; round neckline; wide sleeve openings trimmed at inside in various printed fabrics; neckline, front chest area and upper back embroidered in yellow, orange, mint green, blue, tan, and black with four horizontal elements on chest, V-shaped medallion at center of chest and knot on upper back
markings: at PL shoulder, on tag: [N-N 162 / shirt of shepherd? / embroidered] and [75\" long / 110\" around hem]; inside hem on back, on sticker: [N-N-162 / Embroidered shirt / Provenance:  Northern Nigeria]
title: Man's shepherd shirt
